WorkItem.Description:
Greetings,

I have installed Microsoft Enterprise Library 6 and using Visual Studio 2012 and SQL Server 2008. Everything has been compiled except the line which start as:

 Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Data.DatabaseFactory.SetDatabaseProviderFactory(new Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Data.DatabaseProviderFactory(), false);

The error I am getting is:
Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Data.DatabaseFactory does not contain a definition for
SetDatabaseProviderFactory.

Am I missing something here. Your assistant would be greatly appreciated.

Alex
WorkItem.Summary: Issue with Microsoft Enterprise Library 6 SetDatabaseFactory
